name: flord.bas
title: Fantasy Lord
author: Stan Patton
notes:
Don't press any keys before the
menu, it exits early!

name: kalvi.bas
title: Kamikaze Aliens VI
author: Jester
specs:
Mode 12 graphics
Keyboard, PC Speaker
QBasic
usage:
Up/Down/Left/Right - move
Space - shoot
Escape - exit

name: pfamem3.bas
title: Park Fighters 2
author: Roger Bush
specs:
Mode 13 graphics
Keyboard, PC Speaker
QBasic
usage:
Left/Right - move
Period - punch
Comma - kick
Spacebar - exit

name: worms.bas
title: WORMS! With Human Heads
author: Ben Piko
specs:
Mode 13 graphics
Keyboard, PC Speaker
QBasic
usage:
Ctrl/Alt - move
Shift - jump
Space - magic
S - sound
Esc - exit
notes:
Press shift+R to start.
Need Insert+NumLock on to move
Runs fast.
